subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When Kevin Laue was born, the circulation to his left arm was cut off by the umbilical cord, stunting its growth. Next season he’ll be getting a chance to play N.C.A.A. Division I basketball.
